sentences.english: Medicated shampoo keeps your hair healthy.
I rinsed the shampoo out of my hair .
sentences.chinese: 我把頭髮上的洗髮劑沖洗乾淨了。
你喜歡什麼樣的洗髮劑？

sentences.english: It is wise for you to shampoo your hair often.
sentences.chinese: 你經常用洗髮劑洗頭是明智的。

sentences.english: There were no shampoo or soap in the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 浴室裏沒有香皂和洗髮劑。

sentences.english: She wetted her hair and then put shampoo on it.
sentences.chinese: 她把頭髮弄溼後抹上洗髮劑。

sentences.english: I've rinsed the shampoo out of my hair.
sentences.chinese: 我把頭髮上的洗髮劑沖洗乾淨了。
這是一種特殊的洗髮劑。

sentences.english: This shampoo helps to get rid of scurf .
sentences.chinese: 這種洗髮劑有助於去頭屑。
是的，我還要一些洗髮劑。
是的，我還要一些洗髮劑。

sentences.english: I'm looking for shampoo and hair conditioner for oily hair.
sentences.chinese: 我正在找吹風機和去油性頭髮的洗髮劑。
